article_title: Health Insurance Plans Are Changing from PPOs to EPOs
article_text:
Rising Rate CDs Are Not the Best Option for Growth-Seeking Investors

Get real: rising rate CDs are not always the best choice for investors who are seeking to stash their cash in a liquid investment because other options generate better yields.

article_metadata.description: Many health insurance companies are shedding some of their plans such as PPOs and replacing them with EPOs for next year, which do not provide consumers with out-of-network coverage.
article_metadata.author: Ellen Chang
